# Introduction

In this document we perform the preprocessing and analysis of mzML files to
determine retention times and measured ions for the internal standards.


# Data preprocessing

- load the *std_serum_files.txt* file.
- subset to the first mix (Mix01).
- import the data.
- perform chromatographic peak detection.
